product_name: Sugoi RPM Tri Tank Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: You've trained; you're ready. Now slip into the Sugoi Blast Tri men's tank top and focus on the miles ahead. It's designed to keep you comfortable during each stage of the race. Polyester and spandex fabric offers solid moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance; a touch of stretch enhances comfort during movement. Mesh side panels expel excess heat and a 10 in. front zipper offers ventilation. Single rear pocket stashes energy gels. High front neckline and next-to-body, friction-free fit reduces drag in the water. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and increase durability.
short_description: You've trained; you're ready. Now slip into the Sugoi Blast Tri men's tank top and focus on the miles ahead. It's designed to keep you comfortable during each stage of the race.
